## Project thoughts

I am interested in exploring data related to voting patterns of permanent versus non-permanent members of the United Nations Security Council. I specifically am interested in looking at whether votes alight more with specific members of the Security Council: alignment with the United States as opposed to alignment with the Russian Federation.
